# Task 07 â€” Welcome animation screen

## Summary

Implement the initial welcome screen with a simple animation/video element that fades out after ~1 second then routes to landing.

## Requirements

- Shows a centered animation.
- Fades out automatically after a short delay.
- Routes to `/login` or `/records` based on session.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Welcome screen is shown briefly and transitions correctly.

## How to Test

- Manual: open `/` and observe transition; test both logged-in and logged-out.

## Dependencies

- phase-2/01-auth-ui-and-bootstrap.md
